name: GHA Composite Action: Node Setup + Cache
description: Reusable composite action to setup Node and cache deps.

files.template:
name: Node Setup Cache
description: Setup Node.js and cache deps by lockfile
runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: 20
    - uses: actions/cache@v4
      with:
        path: node_modules
        key: node-${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json', 'pnpm-lock.yaml', 'yarn.lock') }}
        restore-keys: |
          node-
    - run: npm ci
      shell: bash
